Patient 38: Patient 38 is a 75-year-old male with a history of chronic kidney disease stage 3 and type 2 diabetes. He is on metformin and a low-dose aspirin regimen. His medication list also includes lisinopril for blood pressure control. He has experienced previous medication adjustments due to declining renal function. His family history is significant for diabetes and hypertension. He has a documented allergy to penicillin.
